metadata.title: CVE-2023-0632 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.2 before 16.0.8, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.3, allversions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.2. A Regular Expression Denial ofService was possible by using crafted payloads to search Harbor Registry.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
